queries.hasRole: select count(r.ROLE_ID) from IRD_SYS_ROLE r WITH (NOLOCK) inner join IRD_SYS_USER_ROLE ur WITH (NOLOCK) on r.ROLE_ID = ur.ROLE_ID where ur.USER_ID = (:userId) and r.STATUS='A' and r.ROLE=(:role)
queries.hasAnyRole: select count(r.ROLE_ID) from IRD_SYS_ROLE r WITH (NOLOCK) inner join IRD_SYS_USER_ROLE ur WITH (NOLOCK) on r.ROLE_ID = ur.ROLE_ID where ur.USER_ID = (:userId) and r.STATUS='A' and r.ROLE in (:roles)
queries.hasPermission: select count(f.FUNC_CODE) from IRD_SYS_FUNC f WITH (NOLOCK) left join IRD_SYS_ROLE_FUNC rf WITH (NOLOCK) on f.FUNC_ID = rf.func_id left join IRD_SYS_USER_ROLE ur WITH (NOLOCK) on rf.ROLE_ID = ur.role_id left join IRD_SYS_ROLE r WITH (NOLOCK) on r.ROLE_ID = ur.ROLE_ID where ur.USER_ID=(:userId) and r.STATUS = 'A' and f.FUNC_CODE=(:funcCode) and f.status='A'
queries.getFuncCodesByUserId: SELECT DISTINCT(DSF.FUNC_CODE) FROM IRD_SYS_FUNC DSF WITH (NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN IRD_SYS_ROLE_FUNC DSRF WITH (NOLOCK) ON DSRF.FUNC_ID = DSF.FUNC_ID LEFT JOIN IRD_SYS_ROLE DSR WITH (NOLOCK) ON DSR.ROLE_ID = DSRF.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN IRD_SYS_USER_ROLE DSUR WITH (NOLOCK) ON DSUR.ROLE_ID = DSR.ROLE_ID WHERE DSUR.USER_ID = :userId AND DSR.STATUS = 'A' AND DSF.STATUS = 'A'
